name: 12th Energy Storage World Forum
content: The 12th Energy Storage World Forum: 8-10 October 2019, Rome will feature speakers from 16 Utilities, 2 IPPs, 2 C&Is, 7 Regulators from 19 countries. Join us for a fun-filled evening at the Pool Deck of Sheraton Roma Hotel on 8 Oct 2019 for a Gala Dinner to mingle with more attendees from companies such as TENNET, TRANSNET, TERNA, EKZ, KEPCO and UKRENERGO. Download their programme here: https://energystorageforum.com/download-program
